akn:section.akn:heading: Serious adverse event reporting for nonprescription drugs

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Contents of reports Each serious adverse event report under this section shall be submitted to the Secretary using the MedWatch form, which may be modified by the Secretary for nonprescription drugs, and may be accompanied by additional information.

(f) Protected information A serious adverse event report submitted to the Secretary under this section, including any new medical information submitted under subsection (c)(2), or an adverse event report voluntarily submitted to the Secretary shall be considered to be—

(g) Rule of construction The submission of any adverse event report in compliance with this section shall not be construed as an admission that the nonprescription drug involved caused or contributed to the adverse event.
(i) Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated to carry out this section such sums as may be necessary.
